paper_keywords: Spiking neural P system with anti-spikes
paper_abstract: An Spiking Neural P system with anti-spikes uses two types of objects called spikes and anti-spikes which can encode binary digits in a natural way. The step when system emits a spike or an anti-spike is associated with symbol 1 and 0, respectively. Here we consider these computing devices as language generators. They allow non-determinism between the rules a(c) -> a and a(c) -> (a) over bar, c is an element of N, thus help to generate languages which cannot be generated using simple SN P systems.
paper_title: ON STRING LANGUAGES GENERATED BY SPIKING NEURAL P SYSTEMS WITH ANTI-SPIKES
